name.ja: ヴァルモニカ・イントナーレ

text.en:
Apply 1 of these effects (your opponent's choice, if you do not have a "Valmonica" card in your Pendulum Zone).
● Gain 500 LP, then, if you have a monster in your GY that can be Special Summoned, your opponent chooses 1 of them for you to Special Summon.
● Take 500 damage, then you can add 1 Level 4 monster from your GY to your hand.
You can only activate 1 "Valmonica Intonare" per turn.
